Crises force us to change, to find new ways of doing things. Communities that can adapt, that are willing to learn and grow, are more likely to survive.

I may be locked up, but I still see the world outside. And I know that even in the darkest of times, there's always hope. It's the resilience of the human spirit that shines through, the refusal to give up, that makes all the difference.
